content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant sought to dissolve their marriage with the defendant and requested a time limit for reconciliation the dissolution of the marriage due to the defendants fault and the establishment of a place of residence for their minor child they also requested a specific visitation schedule for the child and child support from the defendant the court determined that the vehicle in question belonged to the applicant and ordered the defendant to pay maintenance and the costs of the proceedings interim measures were put in place to protect the child including temporary residence with the mother and temporary maintenance payments the court upheld the action and dissolved the marriage due to fault on the part of the defendant the court also ordered the defendant to pay a state stamp duty and the costs of the proceedings to the state tax inspectorate
